entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
